import React, { useState } from "react"; import MainLayout from "../layouts/MainLayout"; import UserService from "../services/UserService"; const Login = () => { let [loginData, setLoginData] = useState({}); const handleInputChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setLoginData({ ...loginData, [name]: value }); }; const doLogin = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); UserService.login(loginData) .then((res)=>{}) .then((res)=>{}) } return (

Login

 ); }; export default Login;
